    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Calculating the speed of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berechnung der Lichtgeschwindigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calcul de la vitesse de la lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calculando a velocidade de luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcolazione della velocità di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογισμός της ταχύτητας του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calcular la velocidad de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the path of light from Io and Jupiter during an eclipse to the Earth at different times.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Io</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jupiter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Ole Romer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">planetary distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">speed of light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sun.</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht den Pfad des Lichtes 
von Io und des Jupiter während einer Eklipse mit der Masse zu den 
unterschiedlichen Zeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare la voie d'accès de la 
lumière du E/S et du Jupiter pendant une éclipse à la terre à 
différentes heures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara o trajeto da luz do Io e
do Jupiter durante um eclipse à terra em horas diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta il percorso di luce
da Io e di Jupiter durante l'eclipse alla terra ai tempi differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει το μονοπάτι του φωτός 
από Io και Δία κατά τη διάρκεια μιας έκλειψης με τη γη στους 
διαφορετικούς χρόνους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara el camino de la luz del
Io y de Júpiter durante un eclipse a la tierra en diversas horas.</string>
          </description>
